Natours

This is a pure CSS3/Sass Landing page developed for a Outdoors Tours Company. It showcases available tours, reviews, and contact form in clean and simple design to facilitate user navigation.

  • Check it out

Trillo

A beautiful UI designed for a fictional three in one app plane, car rental and hotel finder. Find your next destination on Trillo.

  • Check it out

Nexter

Pure CSS3/Sass Landing page developed for a real estate company showcasing company services, properties, reviews and a lot more!

  • Check it out

Double up!

Are you ready? to DOUBLE UP? In this game you try to outluck your opponent by rolling a pair of dice. You can roll how many times you want per turn but becareful everytime you roll a one or a double six you lose your turn and your points.

  • Check it out

Weather app

Weather application developed by combining Geolocation API and a Forecast API based on latitude and longitude, using Node.js for backend, HBS as template engine and Request npm package to handle HTTP requests. Enter a any country, city or county and enjoy having an accurate weather forecast.

  • Check it out
